comment:
* {@usesMathJax} * *

Defines the parameters for the ICC parametric curve type 4, as * defined in ICC.1:2004-10, section 10.15.

* *

The EOTF is of the form:

* * \(\begin{equation} * Y = \begin{cases}c X + f & X \lt d \\\ * \left( a X + b \right) ^{g} + e & X \ge d \end{cases} * \end{equation}\) * *

The corresponding OETF is simply the inverse function.

* *

The parameters defined by this class form a valid transfer * function only if all the following conditions are met:

*
    *
  • No parameter is a {@link Double#isNaN(double) Not-a-Number}
    • *
  • \(d\) is in the range \([0..1]\)
    • *
  • The function is not constant
    • *
  • The function is positive and increasing
    • *

variables.name: a
variables.comment: Variable \(a\) in the equation of the EOTF described above.

variables.name: b
variables.comment: Variable \(b\) in the equation of the EOTF described above.

variables.name: c
variables.comment: Variable \(c\) in the equation of the EOTF described above.

variables.name: d
variables.comment: Variable \(d\) in the equation of the EOTF described above.

variables.name: e
variables.comment: Variable \(e\) in the equation of the EOTF described above.

variables.name: f
variables.comment: Variable \(f\) in the equation of the EOTF described above.

variables.name: g
variables.comment: Variable \(g\) in the equation of the EOTF described above.
